title: Looking to ID this font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724101829im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_5270.jpg)

I have no idea what it is. Please help !

Thanks so much
author: kapp2377

comments.content: It looks like a manually emboldened **[Bernard MT Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20140724101829/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Monotype&ffam=Bernard%20MT%20Condensed%20-%20Regular&fid=a552118ceee33dff8a6acab5d1c10b60&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=BARK&fit=1)**
